actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for the merit selection of United States attorneys.
short_title: Merit Selection for United States Attorneys Act

summary.text: Merit Selection for United States Attorneys Act - Amends provisions of Federal law dealing with the appointment of United States attorneys to limit them to two full terms, to set forth the reasons for which they may be removed from office, and to establish a new method for their selection utilizing a United States Attorney Selection Commission for each judicial district.

titles.title: Merit Selection for United States Attorneys Act
A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide for the merit selection of United States attorneys.
